title: A few T206 Displays, and Pennzoni Display
author: Archive

posts.post_title: A few T206 Displays, and Pennzoni Display
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Trae R.
I'm looking to sell any of the below that you may be interested in. Please email any interest to trae@t206.org - Buyer responsible for shipping costs, which I can figure out based on your zip-code. If you want the Pennzoni I don't think it's worth the shipping costs, you may want to pick it up. I live in Deland, FL.

Black Pennzoni wall case:
$40
[url]http://www.pennzonidisplay.com/index.asp?PageAction=VIEWPROD&ProdID=151[/url]
[IMG]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1147/1260235677_ab4109cc61.jpg[/IMG]

Almost 3 feet long? Happy to measure if you want to know specifically.
$150
[IMG]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1097/1260235853_bbbeebe3cd.jpg[/IMG]


10 x 7 each I am guessing.. I can measure specifically if you want:
(would sell individually, or as a group)
$39 each or $169 for the group.
[IMG]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1239/1261089634_cebbed009f.jpg[/IMG]
